title: Converting Binary to Decimal and Vice versa
content: Welcome to Converting Binary to Decimal and Converting Decimal to Binary level! In this level, we'll explore the fascinating world of binary numbers and learn how to convert them into our familiar decimal system.

title: Converting Binary to Decimal and Vice versa
content: Binary and decimal are two ways we represent numbers. In the decimal system, we use ten digits (0-9) to express all numbers. In contrast, binary uses only two digits, 0 and 1. Let's see how we can convert binary numbers into decimals and vice versa.

title: You are fantasic !
content: Thank you for joining us in the 'Converting Binary to Decimal and Vice Versa' level. Now, get ready to put your knowledge to the test in the exciting game that awaits you. Good luck, and have fun!
